resources.string: This software is an open source software that complies with the GNU GPLv3.0 license and does not contain any guarantee. Your download, installation, use and other behaviors are voluntary. You need to be fully responsible for the consequences of account blocking caused by the use of third-party client(s).
After the following simple steps, you can quickly install the "Hoyoverse" game on your Mac.
Select the game and server you want to install
Select the storage location of the game data file
You can select the empty directory to reinstall, or you can choose the existing data to use directly.
Choose a directory that does not require additional permissions or the directory where the game executable file is located.
We will download the complete copy of the game to the directory you selected.
Get the information of the game package
Download and unpack the pre-compiled program package
You can take a break while we are installing, which will last for a while.
We will directly use the existing data packets.
Be brought to a successful completion
Now, you can continue your two-dimensional journey!
